name: dazzling
effect: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.
short_effect: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
